feed.title: Google Cloud: Assured Workloads
feed.subtitle: Changelog for Google Cloud product: Assured Workloads

entry.content:
The [Data Boundary for Impact Level 4 (IL4)](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/control-packages#il4) now supports the following products:
* Certificate Authority Service * Cloud Build * Cloud NAT * GKE Hub * Memorystore for Redis * Secret Manager * Sensitive Data Protection
The [Data Boundary for Impact Level 5 (IL5)](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/control-packages#il5) now supports the following products:
* Certificate Authority Service * Cloud Build * Cloud NAT * Cloud VPN * GKE Hub * Memorystore for Redis * Secret Manager * Sensitive Data Protection
See [Supported products by control package](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/supported-products) for more information.
entry.summary: The Data Boundary for Impact Level 4 (IL4) and Impact Level 5 (IL5) now support several new products, including Certificate Authority Service, Cloud Build, Cloud NAT, GKE Hub, Memorystore for Redis, Secret Manager, and Sensitive Data Protection. IL5 also adds support for Cloud VPN.
entry.title: Feature: New Products Supported for IL4 and IL5 Data Boundaries

entry.content:
The [IRS 1075 control package](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/control-packages#irs-1075) now supports the following products:
* Access Transparency * Backup for GKE * Cloud Healthcare API * Cloud OS Login API * Cloud Workstations * Conversational Agents * Conversational Insights * Dataplex Universal Catalog * Document AI * Essential Contacts * Eventarc * External passthrough Network Load Balancer * Generative AI on Vertex AI * Google Agentspace * Google Cloud Armor * Google Cloud NetApp Volumes * Google Security Operations SOAR * Identity and Access Management (IAM) * Infrastructure Manager * Integration Connectors * Internal passthrough Network Load balancer * Jurisdictional Cloud Console * Looker (Google Cloud core) * Organization Policy Service * Regional external Application Load Balancer * Regional external proxy Network Load Balancer * Regional internal Application Load Balancer * Regional internal proxy Network Load Balancer * Storage Transfer Service * VPC Service Controls * Virtual Private Cloud (VPC)
entry.summary: The IRS 1075 control package now supports a wider range of products, including Access Transparency, Backup for GKE, Cloud Healthcare API, and more. This expansion aims to enhance compliance and security for sensitive data.
entry.title: Feature: IRS 1075 control package now supports more products

entry.content: The names for some Assured Workloads control packages have changed. The new names are reflected in the Google Cloud console and the API, such as the [`ComplianceRegime`](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/reference/rest/Shared.Types/ComplianceRegime) enums that are used when creating a new workload using the Assured Workloads API. For information about the name change, see [Control package renaming notice](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/overview#name-change).
entry.summary: Control package names in Assured Workloads have been updated in the Google Cloud console and API. This change affects enums like ComplianceRegime used in workload creation.
entry.title: Changed: Assured Workloads Control Packages Renamed

entry.content:
The FedRAMP Moderate and FedRAMP High [control packages](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/control-packages#regulatory-controls) now support the following products:
* Agent Assist * Looker (Google Cloud core) * Vertex AI Vector Search
entry.summary: We're excited to announce that Agent Assist, Looker, and Vertex AI Vector Search now support FedRAMP Moderate and FedRAMP High control packages.
entry.title: Feature: New FedRAMP support for multiple products

entry.content:
The [IL2 control package](https://cloud.google.com/assured-workloads/docs/control-packages#il2) now supports the following products:
* Agent Assist * Binary Authorization * Certificate Authority * Conversational Agents (Dialogflow CX) * Identity-Aware Proxy (IAP) * Looker (Google Cloud core) * Vertex AI Vector Search
entry.summary: The IL2 control package has been updated to include support for Agent Assist, Binary Authorization, Certificate Authority, Conversational Agents (Dialogflow CX), Identity-Aware Proxy (IAP), Looker, and Vertex AI Vector Search.
entry.title: Feature: IL2 Control Package Now Supports More Products
